name: The Party King
description:
Features:

2 challenge types for all stages: A planning and execution challenge, and a speedrun challenge. 

A full soundtrack by 5 artists.

DANCING! Use UP and DOWN arrows to dance with your fellow partygoers.

This game was made in 4 days for Major Jam 2, completed 6 July 2020. Texture page for game must be smaller than 128x128. Link: https://imgur.com/a/zdNM8Z1
